channel.title: Post your car!
channel.description:
ITT: Post your automobile!
[img]http://fpspro.net/images/cars/corsa.JPG[/img]
My shitty corsa :(
Next year I hope to get a golf/astra/mini or something!

item.title: Post your car!
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

I drive a 2002 Mitsubishi Lancer O.Z. Rally edition.
I’ve had it for about 4 months now.

So far I have personally installed:
-Aftermarket intake manifold with a K&N.
-New headers, new downpipe, pipe intake, new Cat.
-Full Zigen exhaust
-Stage-2 clutch.
-Performance chip
-New slave and master cylinder.

Hopefully i’ll be replacing the pistons and running like 12 pounds of turbo soon?

Pictures are of when I first bought it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:133, topic:266369”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=351827.msg3609917#msg3609917 date=1306465361]
Not ours (same look, model, etc), but this is what I’ll be driving when I get my license in August…

[/quote]

[quote author=mutex_ link=topic=351827.msg3608247#msg3608247 date=1306301438]
Get the fuck out of here. :jealous: :jealous: :jealous: :jealous: :jealous: :jealous: :jealous: :jealous:
[/quote][/quote]
I’ve actually been looking at buying a 2 door Rubicon with a 6-speed manual transmission The problem is finding exactly what I want used, and new is about $32000 starting. That’s with nothing added on, except for getting a hard & soft top. I would get just the soft top, but those are fucking terrible in the winter here.

item.title: Post your car!
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:124, topic:266369”]might be able to take a picture later.

but this looks exactly like mine except for the front bumper add-on(idk if thats like a bullbar or not).(mines a banshee, we think b/c one of the ball bearings is going out on one of the pulleys[thinking the a/c pulley]. makes a horrible high pitch squealing sound.)

mine needs some work. im hoping changing the plug wires will fix the jolt my engine make around 30-40 mph. i had the jolt b4 but it went away when i changed the spark plugs. i dont know much about cars, but would like to learn more. i actually hope it holds out on me until i save up to get a challenger. the gas mileage is horrible.

my dad and i fixed it up. it hadnt been drove in 4 years. had to change the brake lines(pain in the ass when u dont have resources to do it the easy way), the starter, the battery, spark plugs, brakes, fuel filter, transmission oil, replace tail lights and covers(fn neighbor kids busted them out with a baseball bat, $60 a pop used) and some other stuff(normal maintenance, not hard stuff).

my family car i dont have a pic but heres one from google. its pretty close except our one doesnt have chrome rims:

it use to get good gas mileage but since we are driving it without the MAF sensor connected it gets like 10 mpg less. why we drive with it off is b/c when its connected we will be driving and then bam engine problems after a little bit of driving.

my brother races ppl in town. he says hes beat everyone hes raced except for a challenger. he beat a mustang and various others vehicles. some guy with his gf(the guys not my brothers) challenged him. the guy just spend like $2k+ on upgrades on his suburban and lost. the guy was pretty pissed, and then the guys gf blew my brother a kiss which made the guy swerve towards my brother but she stopped the guy b4 he hit my brother.[/quote]

The one in your first picture is quite obviously a ex/police car… See the ram bar and the torch thing above the driver side mirror.

Read full topic

my dad and i fixed it up. it hadnt been drove in 4 years. had to change the brake lines(pain in the ass when u dont have resources to do it the easy way), the starter, the battery, spark plugs, brakes, fuel filter, transmission oil, replace tail lights and covers(fn neighbor kids busted them out with a baseball bat, $60 a pop used) and some other stuff(normal maintenance, not hard stuff).
